snippet: The International Criminal Court has issued an arrest warrant for a man suspected of tampering with witnesses in the war crimes case against William Ruto, Kenya’s deputy president.
abstract: International Criminal Court issues arrest warrant for Kenyan journalist Walter Barasa, man suspected of tampering with witnesses in war crimes case against William Ruto, Kenya’s deputy president.
lead_paragraph: The International Criminal Court has issued an arrest warrant for a man suspected of tampering with witnesses in the war crimes case against William Ruto, Kenya’s deputy president.

headline.main: The Hague: Warrant Issued for Kenyan
headline.print_headline: The Hague: Warrant Issued for Kenyan

keywords.value: War Crimes, Genocide and Crimes Against Humanity
